top_comments_top.body:
Tldr: I agree with you 

At the start of the song i get the vibe that the significant other finds help for problems in their relationship with others. 

From the perspective of the main singer he seems to still have love / feelings (whatever you want to call it) for the person he’s singing about and its “shattered his soul” So could the significant other have done something which is unforgivable? 

He still loves them but knows that he cant be with them and cant bring himself to end the relationship, so he’s asking for the significant other to do this for him as due to his feelings he cant. 

Let me know what you think ☺️
